p: Territory of Washington In Justice Court before County of Walla Walla OP Lacy Justice of the Peace
Territory of Washington Charged with being an vs Habitual Drunkard Adaline Oneil Deft a disorderly person

Now this cause ccoming in to be heard this 25th day of July 1876 J G Justice John Lucas and S were sworn on the part of the territory and the charge being fully sustained by the evidence the said Defendant was duly convicted as a vagrant and was required to give bonds in the sum of one hundred dollars for her good bevahior for three months and in default of bonds was committed to Jail for the term of three months as until discharged by due course of law
